title: Kawaii Sensei
alternative_title: Kawaii Sensei ; My Cute Teacher ; かわいいせんせい
status: Kawaii Sensei ; My Cute Teacher ; かわいいせんせい
description:
Description :
        Middle school English teacher Mr. Miyata is bummed at the idea of having to supervise the kendo club from spring, all because he's bad at getting along with sporty types. At first, he also thinks that Mr. Samehara, the affiliated high school's P.E. teacher in charge of coaching the kendo club, will be a meathead, too. But, he begins to feel that there might be something going on behind his fleeting, fake smile. Unable to resist the urge to find out what he's hiding, Mr. Miyata takes a leap of faith and...
